title: The Writer's Guide to Everyday Life in Renaissance England: From 1485-1649
description: Writers will save hours of valuable research time and bring a richness and historical accuracy to their work as they reference the slice-of-life facts depicted for each of these major time periods. Each book contains descriptions of the period's food and clothes; customs and slang; occupations; common religious and political practices; and other historical details.
author: Kathy Lynn Emerson
